config.preventer.description.description:
'Module Notifications' will be displayed if a 
activated module prevents an action. 
§4This button doesn't do anything!§4
config.preventer.noPath.tooltip: Prevents you from creating path blocks
config.preventer.hideTotem.tooltip: Hides totems of undying in the offhand
config.preventer.noGlowBerrieHarvest.too: Prevents you from harvesting Glow Berries
config.preventer.noSweetBerrieHarvest.to: Prevents you from harvesting Sweet Berries
config.preventer.onlyMatureCropHarvest.t:
Prevents you from harvesting 
(breaking) non mature crops
§4The targeted crop is not yet mature§4
config.preventer.lowDurabilityProtection:
Prevents tools & weapons from 
being broken due to low durability
§4Tool usage prevented due to low durability§4
Specify the lowest durability for tools & weapons
Prevents you from attacking Zombified Piglins
config.preventer.noTrappedChestOpening.t: Prevents you from opening trapped chests
config.preventer.preventBuddingAmethystB: Prevents you from breaking Budding Amethyst blocks
config.preventer.preventRocketUse.toolti: Prevents you from using firework rockets by accident
config.preventer.preventRocketUse.mainHa: Prevent Rocket Use in Main Hand
config.preventer.preventRocketUse.offhan: Prevents Accidental rocket use in the offhand
config.preventer.preventRocketUse.mainHa: Prevents Accidental rocket use in the main hand
config.preventer.preventEndCrystalHittin: Prevents you from hitting End Crystals
config.preventer.preventBedUse.tooltip: Prevents you using beds in the End or Nether dimension
config.preventer.preventCoralPlace.toolt: Prevents you from placing corals out of water
config.preventer.preventCoralPlace.text: §4Out of water coral placing was prevented§4
config.preventer.preventWaterPlace.toolt: Prevents you from placing water in the Nether
